seo.title: How Manofix Works | From Posting a Task to Getting It Done
seo.description: Learn how Manofix connects customers with skilled professionals. Discover our simple process for posting tasks, finding taskers, and getting work done safely.

hero.title: So funktioniert Manofix
hero.subtitle: Connecting customers with skilled professionals has never been easier. Learn how our platform works for both customers and taskers.

forCustomers.title: For Customers
forCustomers.subtitle: Get your tasks done by skilled professionals in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Post Your Request
step1.description: Describe what you need done, set your budget, and choose your preferred date and time.

step2.title: Receive Offers
step2.description: Qualified taskers will send you offers with their rates and availability. Review their profiles and ratings.

step3.title: Choose & Chat
step3.description: Select the best tasker for your needs and chat with them to finalize the details before they start.

step4.title: Get It Done
step4.description: Your chosen tasker completes the work. Pay securely through our platform and leave a review.

forTaskers.title: For Taskers
forTaskers.subtitle: Start earning money by helping others with their tasks in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Sign up, verify your identity, and showcase your skills, experience, and portfolio to attract customers.

step2.title: Find Tasks
step2.description: Browse available tasks in your area that match your skills. Use filters to find the perfect opportunities.

step3.title: Send Offers
step3.description: Submit competitive offers with your rates and timeline. Communicate with customers to understand their needs.

step4.title: Complete & Get Paid
step4.description: Do great work, get paid securely through our platform, and build your reputation with positive reviews.

safety.title: Safety & Trust

seo.title: About Us - Manofix
seo.description: Manofix - Bridging Technology and Human Touch

hero.title: Manofix - Bridging Technology and Human Touch

content.intro: At Manofix, we recognize the double-edged sword of technology: its potential to disrupt traditional jobs, yet also its power to forge new connections between those needing work and those seeking to provide it. In an era where purchasing products online has become second nature, the realm of procuring services still lags behind, often mired in complexity and inefficiency.
content.mission: Our mission is to transform the way services are bought and sold, making it as simple and straightforward as buying a product online. From household chores to technical support, Manofix is about leveraging AI and cutting-edge technology to connect people in a meaningful way, ensuring that every individual can realize the full value of their unique skills.

forCustomers.title: For Our Customers
forCustomers.description: For our customers, Manofix promises a seamless experience in purchasing local services: Post a request, receive offers, and choose your Tasker with ease. We offer a wide range of services, secure payments, insurance, and a win-win fee model, all designed to make service acquisition transparent and hassle-free.

forTaskers.title: For Taskers
forTaskers.description: For Taskers, Manofix opens the door to flexible work opportunities, allowing them to tap into a stream of income without any upfront fees. Our tiered pricing model rewards positive behavior, lowering fees for those who consistently deliver quality service.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision goes beyond merely facilitating transactions. We aim to create jobs, purpose, and income, empowering people to harness the full potential of their skills in a changing world. At Manofix, we believe that people matter, and in the power of technology to connect, not divide. Join us on this journey to redefine the service industry across Europe, making it work for everyone.

cta.title: Bereit, loszulegen?
cta.description: Are you ready to redefine how services are bought and sold? Join Manofix today, and be part of a movement that values every person's skills and strives to make service booking as easy as a click. With Manofix, support is always at your fingertips.

seo.title: Manofix Terms & conditions
seo.description: Manofix Terms & conditions

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: The website accessible at www.manofix.com is designed, edited, and hosted on AWS. By accessing and using the Site, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

access.title: Access to the Site
access.content: Access to the Site is free. Users will only be charged a fee when booking a service online. To book a service or to be listed as a service provider, users must create an account through the Site.

information.title: Required Information
information.content: Users must provide the necessary information to create an account. For service providers, this includes their name, address, email, mobile phone number, profile picture, CV, a copy of an identity document, and an IBAN number to receive payments.

responsibility.title: User Responsibility
responsibility.content: Users are responsible for ensuring that all provided information is accurate and up-to-date. They are also responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their credentials.

credentials.title: Forgotten Credentials
credentials.content: In case of forgotten credentials or unauthorized use, users must immediately inform the Company through our contact page.

providers.title: Service Provider Requirements
providers.content: Service providers are required to complete missions according to reservations made by service takers. Service takers will fill in a form, validate the service, and provide their credit card details for payment.

commission.title: Commission
commission.content: Manofix will receive a commission equivalent to 5% of the total amount of each service provided.

cancellations.title: Cancellations and Changes
cancellations.content: Service cancellations and changes may incur additional charges or fees.

userTermination.title: User Termination
userTermination.content: Users can terminate and delete their account and data directly on the app, in case of doubt please get in touch with us through our contact page.

companyRights.title: Company Rights
companyRights.content: Manofix reserves the right to suspend, restrict, or close a User Account in cases of abnormal use or if there are reasonable grounds to believe that the account has been hacked or its use is contrary to this Agreement.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Manofix is not responsible for any indirect or consequential damages arising from the use of the Site or Services. The total liability owed by Manofix for damages arising from breach and negligence in the execution of the Contract Services may not exceed the total amount received by the Company through the Service subject to a claim.

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.content: Users' personal data will only be used for the purposes of the Services. Recipients of this data include the service taker, service provider, Manofix, and the host of the Site and Services.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: During visits to the Site, a cookie may be automatically installed in the user's browser. Users may configure their browser settings to report the presence of cookies and reject them.

forceMajeure.title: Force Majeure
forceMajeure.content: Manofix is not responsible for events beyond the reasonable control of either party, including natural disasters, war, explosions, fires, floods, storms, earthquakes, insurrection, terrorism, riots, civil disturbances, rebellions, strikes, lockouts, or other labor conflicts causing a strike, blockade, or social conflict that makes it impossible to perform the service.

amendments.title: Amendments
amendments.content: Manofix reserves the right to modify the terms and conditions of the Contract at any time.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is deemed invalid or unenforceable under applicable law or a final judicial decision, such provision will be disregarded without affecting the remaining provisions, which will remain in full force and effect.

independence.title: Independence
independence.content: Each party agrees not to commit on behalf of and/or in the name of the other party. Each party is solely responsible for its acts, allegations, commitments, services, products, and personnel.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: All correspondence for the Company should be sent through our contact page.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.content: Subscription plans provide access to premium features and are billed on a recurring basis according to the plan selected. Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the next billing date. Subscription fees are non-refundable.

aiFeatures.title: AI Features
aiFeatures.content: Any outputs generated by AI features must be reviewed and verified by the user before use; quotes generated via AI must be double-checked by the user, and requests created or modified using AI must be double-checked by the user. Use of these features and any decisions or actions taken based on them are the sole responsibility of the user, and Manofix is not responsible for the accuracy, suitability, or consequences of such use.

seo.title: Privacy policy | Manofix
seo.description: Privacy policy | Manofix

yourPrivacy.title: Your privacy
yourPrivacy.content1: When you create an account on www.manofix.com or use the Manofix app, we collect personal data including, but not limited to, your Primary Account information, email, full name, address, phone number, IP address, and browser user record. This data is crucial for enhancing our services and understanding our customers' needs. All personal data, including sensitive information collected and shared by our app, is protected, and users can access, modify, or delete their data at any time.
yourPrivacy.content2: When you register on www.manofix.com and become a user, we assure the protection of all your personal data that you provide in your account, including your Primary Account information. However, it is important to note that this data is not limited to your account details but may extend to other personal and sensitive data collected, used, and shared by our app, such as your Primary Account information. Each user can consult, modify, and delete their personal data at any point in time. Webmasters can also view and modify this data.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content1: Cookies are retained for two years.
cookies.content2: Our website and app use cookies to improve your experience. These cookies are used for functions like verifying your browser's cookie acceptance, storing login information, and remembering your screen display settings. Cookies related to your login last for 2 days, while screen settings are retained for one year. Our service may also use third-party code and libraries that employ cookies.
cookies.content3: Our service may also use third-party code and libraries that employ cookies.

thirdParty.title: Third-party services
thirdParty.content1: www.manofix.com may contain content downloaded from other web services (Google, Facebook..). Viewing and interacting with this content uploaded to this website is equivalent to visiting the websites from which the content is downloaded. These external sites have their own privacy policies, which we encourage you to review.
thirdParty.content2: These websites may gather data about you, use cookies, third-party tracking services, and monitor your actions with downloaded content, including when you have an account and are connected to these websites.

informationCollection.title: Information Collection and Use
informationCollection.content: For better service experience, we collect information through our app, including Log Data in case of errors. This may include your device's IP address, device name, operating system version, app configuration, and usage statistics. The personal information we collect is used to provide and improve our Service, and we do not share it except as described in this policy.

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.content: We employ third-party companies for facilitating our Service, providing the Service on our behalf, performing Service-related tasks, or assisting in analyzing how our Service is used. These third parties have access to your Personal Information solely to perform these tasks and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

yourRights.title: Your rights
yourRights.content: If you have an account on this website or have previously posted a comment here, you can request to receive a data export file containing all of the personal information we hold about you, including any information you provide to us. You can also request that we delete any personal information we hold about you. These two requirements do not apply to data that we are legally obliged to keep for administrative, legal or security purposes.

security.title: Security
security.content: To protect your personal information, including your Primary Account information, we take reasonable precautions and adhere to industry best practices to ensure it is not inappropriately lost, misused, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed.

consent.content: By using this website and creating an account, you consent to the collection and use of your data as outlined above. We reserve the right to amend this privacy policy at any time with or without notice. If you have any concerns about your data or this privacy policy, please get in touch with us via the contact information provided on the website.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: Our Privacy Policy may be updated periodically, and we advise reviewing this page for any changes. Changes will be effective upon posting on this page. This policy is effective as of 2025-01-01

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions or suggestions regarding our Privacy Policy, contact us through our contact page.

Designed specifically for SMEs, startups, and growing companies, our API seamlessly integrates professional on-demand services into your existing operations. Whether you're in e-commerce, real estate, short-term rentals, insurance, or any service-oriented industry, our API empowers you to offer comprehensive solutions while significantly reducing operational costs and accessing a wider talent pool.

talentAccess.title: Access Wider Talent Pool

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can customers accept my quote directly on the platform?
faq.a1: YES! All tiers (even Free) can send quotes that customers accept on Manofix. When accepted, it automatically creates a service request and triggers escrow payment. This keeps everything secure and on-platform.
faq.q2: How many offers can I send per day?
faq.a2: Free: 1 offer/day | Pro: 5 offers/day | Pro+: 20 offers/day. This helps maintain quality interactions and prevents spam.
faq.q3: When is my phone number visible to customers?
faq.a3: Free: Only after successful booking. Pro & Pro+: Always visible on your profile. This helps Pro/Pro+ taskers get more direct inquiries.
faq.a4: Coming soon for Pro and Pro+ users! Spend your Manofix earnings directly with a Visa card. Your idle cash also earns interest while sitting in your account.
faq.q5: How does the yield-bearing account work?
faq.a5: Your Manofix balance automatically earns yield (like a savings account). No action needed - your money grows while you work. Pro+ users also get 2% cashback on card spending.
faq.a6: Points (also called FIX points) are rewards you earn on every completed job. They have real value and can be used on the platform. The FIX Point Ratio determines how many points you earn per euro earned: Free tier has a 1:1 ratio (€100 job = 100 points), Pro tier has a 5:1 ratio (€100 job = 500 points), and Pro+ tier has a 10:1 ratio (€100 job = 1,000 points).
faq.q8: What happens when a customer accepts my quote?
faq.a8: 1) Quote converts to service request on Manofix. 2) Customer's payment is charged to their card. 3) Funds held in escrow until job complete. 4) You complete the work. 5) Customer marks as done. 6) Money released to your account. All secure and automatic!
faq.q9: Can I create multiple tasker profiles?
faq.a9: Yes! There's no limit on the number of tasker profiles you can create. Manage all your services and specialties from one account.
faq.q10: Do I need to wait for bank transfers?
faq.a10: Not with the Virtual Visa (Pro/Pro+ coming soon)! Spend earnings instantly. Or continue using traditional payout to your bank account (all tiers).
